articles.title: This is the reason why men get worse coronavirus cases than women - TweakTown
articles.description: A study has revealed the reason why men get more severe cases of COVID-19 than women

articles.title: More Evidence Sugary Drinks Harm Women's Hearts - WebMD
articles.description: Women who drink a lot of sodas, sweetened juices and other sugary drinks are at greater risk of developing heart disease, a new study finds.
articles.content:
WEDNESDAY, May 13, 2020 (HealthDay News) -- Women who drink a lot of sodas, sweetened juices and other sugary drinks are at greater risk of developing heart disease, a new study finds. 
Those who drink one or more a day have nearly a 20% higher risk than wom… [+2183 chars]
